title: So We Launched a Gaming Channel
description:
Purchase a Seasonic GX Power Supply at https://geni.us/F7w6w4g

Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

Subscribe to GameLinked to get gaming news (and maybe more) every Tuesday and Thursday! https://www.youtube.com/@GameLinked

We launched GameLinked but we didn't actually talk a lot about what our plans - or lack thereof - are for the channel. So bam it's a video here ya go
